content: this soft and airy mohair scarf is worked with four strands of pearl mohair held together blending three harmonious colors knitted in double knitting the fabric is beautifully reversible size one size finished measurement 25 cm width x 160 cm length excluding fringes 9¾ inches width × 63 inches length materials a total of 150 g of majo garn pearl mohair 25 g = 210 m 230 yards 70% super kid mohair 30% mulberry silk - color 1 50 g 40 g + 10 g for the fringes - color 2 50 g - color 3 50 g 40 g + 10 g for the fringes 4 strands of yarn held together throughout the project gauge 19 stitches x 12 row = 10 x 10 cm 4 x 4 inches in double knitting on 9 0 mm needles us 13 after washed and blocked note 19 stitches in double knitting equivalent to 9 5 knit stitches suggested needles and notions 9 0 mm needles us 13 tapestry needle colors used for the model pearl mohair col 501 sky blue as color 1 col 100 ivory as color 2 col 105 tiramisu as color 3
